title: F/S - T202 Hassan Triple Fold - PSA / SGC - Part #2 - REDUCED!
author: old-baseball

posts.post_title: F/S - T202 Hassan Triple Fold - PSA / SGC - Part #2 - REDUCED!
posts.post_content:
For sale are the following T202 Hassan Triple Folder cards. All graded by either PSA or SGC. Prices include USPS plus insurance. Mailed payment (check or money order) preferred but will take PayPal F&F. Please reply or ask questions to [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url].
